main event: A bright yellow flare was visually observed rising through the undercast to an altitude of approximately 14,000 feet, then falling back toward the ocean and burning out on the way down.
interesting points: The object was reported to have reached an altitude of about 14,000 feet before descending., No radar or aircraft pickup was noted during the observation., Officials concluded the sighting was a flare., The observation was limited due to an undercast that prevented further investigation., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds.
